languages.text: Гибель людей печальна, но что она в сравнении с гибелью столь величественной машины, как "Рожденный в огне"? Техножрец произнес молитву, оплакивая погибший корабль и моля Омниссию не отворачиваться от людей, хоть они и не могут иногда сберечь его чудесные дары.

So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.
languages.original_text: Гибель людей печальна, но что она в сравнении с гибелью столь величественной машины, как "Рожденный в огне"? Техножрец произнес молитву, оплакивая погибший корабль и моля Омниссию не отворачиваться от людей, хоть они и не могут иногда сберечь его чудесные дары.

The tech-priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

The tech-priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The tech-priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

languages.text: Muchos habían muerto en un suceso verdaderamente trágico, pero el pesar era leve en comparación con la angustia causada por la muerte de una máquina tan magnífica como la Nacida del Fuego. El tecnosacerdote pronunció las plegarias lamentando la nave muerta y suplicando al Omnissiah que no abandonara a la Humanidad aunque a veces sea incapaz de proteger sus generosos regalos.
languages.original_text: So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

traits.locale_text: Muchos habían muerto en un suceso verdaderamente trágico, pero el pesar era leve en comparación con la angustia causada por la muerte de una máquina tan magnífica como la Nacida del Fuego. El tecnosacerdote pronunció las plegarias lamentando la nave muerta y suplicando al Omnissiah que no abandonara a la Humanidad aunque a veces sea incapaz de proteger sus generosos regalos.

languages.text: 船上无数人丧命，这确实是件令人难过的事情。然而，丧命所带来的悲痛，远远无法与“烈焰之子”这种巨型飞船的消亡带来的悲痛相提并论。技术神甫做了祷告，哀叹逝去的飞船，并祈求欧姆尼塞亚不要放弃人类，尽管人类有时候无法守护好祂奇妙的礼物。
languages.original_text: So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

traits.locale_text: 船上无数人丧命，这确实是件令人难过的事情。然而，丧命所带来的悲痛，远远无法与“烈焰之子”这种巨型飞船的消亡带来的悲痛相提并论。技术祭司做了祷告，哀叹逝去的飞船，并祈求欧姆尼塞亚不要放弃人类，尽管人类有时候无法守护好祂奇妙的礼物。

languages.text: とても多くの人が命を落とした悲しい出来事だった。しかし、それはファイアボーンのような偉大な機械の終焉に感じた苦痛に比べればまだ浅い悲しみだ。技術司祭は祈りを唱え、死んだ船を嘆き、人類に背を向けないよう万機神に懇願した。たとえ人類が彼の素晴らしい贈り物を守れなかったとしても。
languages.original_text: So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

traits.locale_text: とても多くの人が命を落とした悲しい出来事だった。しかし、それはファイアボーンのような偉大な機械の終焉に感じた苦痛に比べればまだ浅い悲しみだ。技術司祭は祈りを唱え、死んだ船を嘆き、人類に背を向けないよう万機神に懇願した。たとえ人類が彼の素晴らしい贈り物を守れなかったとしても。

languages.text: So viele waren vergangen, und das war in der Tat traurig. Und doch war es eine unbedeutende Trauer, verglichen mit dem Untergang einer so großartigen Maschine wie der Fireborn. Der Techpriester sprach das Gebet, beklagte das tote Schiff und flehte den Omnissiah an, der Menschheit nicht den Rücken zuzukehren, auch wenn diese seine wunderbaren Geschenke bisweilen nicht zu schützen vermochte.
languages.original_text: So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

traits.locale_text: So viele waren vergangen, und das war in der Tat traurig. Und doch war es eine unbedeutende Trauer, verglichen mit dem Untergang einer so großartigen Maschine wie der Fireborn. Der Techpriester sprach das Gebet, beklagte das tote Schiff und flehte den Omnissiah an, der Menschheit nicht den Rücken zuzukehren, auch wenn diese seine wunderbaren Geschenke bisweilen nicht zu schützen vermochte.

languages.text: Les victimes de ce terrible incident étaient nombreuses, mais la peine causée par leur mort semblait insignifiante comparée à la tragédie que représentait la perte d'une machine aussi splendide que le Flamboyant. Les technoprêtres récitèrent une prière pour faire le deuil du vaisseau mort et supplier l'Omnimessie de ne pas tourner le dos à l'humanité, bien qu'elle ne soit pas toujours capable de protéger Ses merveilleux dons.
languages.original_text: So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

traits.locale_text: Les victimes de ce terrible incident étaient nombreuses, mais la peine causée par leur mort semblait insignifiante comparée à la tragédie que représentait la perte d'une machine aussi splendide que le Flamboyant. Les technoprêtres récitèrent une prière pour faire le deuil du vaisseau mort et supplier l'Omnimessie de ne pas tourner le dos à l'humanité, bien qu'elle ne soit pas toujours capable de protéger Ses merveilleux dons.

languages.text: Birçok ruh öylece yitip gitmişti, yasın ağırlığı hissediliyordu. Ancak bu yas, Ateşten gibi muazzam bir makinenin ölümünün ızdırabının yanında sığ kalıyordu. Tekno Rahipler dua ederek ölü gemi için bir ağıt yaktı. O'nun mucizevi armağanlarını korumayı her daim başaramasalar dahi insanlığa sırtını dönmemesi için Hermesih'e yalvarıp yakardılar.
languages.original_text: So many had perished, and it was sorrowful indeed. But it was a shallow grief compared to the anguish felt at the demise of a machine as magnificent as the Fireborn. The Tech-Priest said the prayer, lamenting the dead ship and beseeching the Omnissiah not to turn His back on Humankind, though they sometimes failed to safeguard His wondrous gifts.

traits.locale_text: Birçok ruh, öylece yitip gitmişti ve yasın ağırlığı hissediliyordu. Ancak bu yas, Ateşten gibi muazzam bir makinenin ölümünün ızdırabı yanında sığ kalıyordu. Tekno Rahipler dua ederek ölü gemi için bir ağıt yaktılar. O'nun mucizevi armağanlarını korumayı her daim başaramasalar dahi, insanlığa sırtını dönmemesi için Hermesih'e yalvarıp yakardılar.
